message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
I understand that $150 is a bit high for you, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $130.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make another small concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing money. I'm thinking of $125.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $118 for the product.
I'm not willing to go much lower than that, but I'm willing to meet you at $122. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $119 for the product.
I'm not going to go any lower than $122, it's my minimum. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm going to have to consider other options.
